ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-Arc170-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The Aggressive ReConnaissance-170 starfighter was a multipurpose starship designed for both intense battle and longer deep-space missions. It measured 12.71 meters in length, contained a hyperdrive, and propelled itself in realspace utilizing two powerful engine systems. Long-range scanners and sensors were contained in the vessel's nose.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.

li.DropShell_Description: Fast Droping shell to around position

li.CrossMap_Description: Cross map, no open space can be selected as the target location. To avoid situations where it is impossible to return, please ensure that there is sufficient fuel for round-trip travel
Cross map, no open space can be selected as the target location. To avoid situations where it is impossible to return, please ensure that there is sufficient fuel for round-trip travel

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-Delta7Interceptor-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: Manufactured by Kuat Systems Engineering, the Delta-7 Aethersprite-class light interceptor was a Jedi-used starfighter that saw extensive action during the last years of the Galactic Republic, and was designed specifically with the Jedi in mind.

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-Eta2Interceptor-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: Measuring 5.47 meters in length,the Eta-2 was a highly maneuverable combat-oriented starfighter utilized by the Jedi Order to lead troops in battle during the final days of the Clone Wars.

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-LAAT-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The LAAT series of gunships was designed to transport and support up to 30 clone troopers in combat. It also had a rear hangar that could hold up to four speeder bikes for reconnaissance operations or search-and-rescue missions. Early LAAT were in-atmosphere-only vehicles, requiring their transporting cruisers to land somewhere on the planet or at least enter its atmosphere in order to launch. Later versions allowed the gunship to fly through space and actually be used for boarding in ship-to-ship battles.

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-V19Torrent-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The V-19 Torrent starfighter was an assault fighter with exceptional speed and maneuverability.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-VWing-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The Alpha-3 Nimbus-class starfighter was a sharp and wedge-shaped fighter. Manufactured by Kuat Systems Engineering, the same company that made Jedi starfighters, V-wings were agile and fast, with the ship having a top speed of 52,000 kilometers per hour and maximum acceleration of 5,200G's.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-BTLBYWing-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: Designed by Koensayr Manufacturing, the BTL-B Y-wing was intended to serve as a combination starfighter and long-range bomber. The two large Koensayr ion jet engines, along with their characteristic nacelles, were carried by a cross wing, which connected to the cockpit module by a central spar. BTL-Bs were equipped with hyperdrives, unlike many other starfighters. This, along with the fuel recycling system present in all BTLs, made Y-wings durable long-range craft, though their tendency to run hot necessitated a complex cooling system extending throughout the ship.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-SoullessOne-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The Soulless One was a customized Belbullab-22 heavy starfighter built by Feethan Ottraw Scalable Assemblies, which had been designed as an upgrade to the Confederacy of Independent Systems' droid starfighters such as the vulture droids and droid tri-fighters.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-DroidGunship-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The HMP droid gunship, otherwise known as the HMP Predator gunship, was one of the deadlier autonomous vehicles designed by the Geonosians and produced by Baktoid Fleet Ordnance and Haor Chall Engineering Corporation to be fielded by the Droid Army of the Confederacy of Independent Systems in response to the Galactic Republic naval forces' Low Altitude Assault Transport line of heavy combat airspeeders.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-HyenaBomber-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The Hyena-class Droid Bomber was a model of droid starfighter that was the technical successor to the smaller, less sturdy, and more lightly armored Variable Geometry Self-Propelled Battle Droid, Mark I, also known as vulture droids. Like its predecessor, it was designed to be cheaper and easier to construct than equivalent starships driven by organic pilots, also making it more disposable. The space that would usually be taken up by a pilot was instead used to carry a hefty armament of ordnance, including light laser cannons, proton torpedos, concussion missiles, and proton bombs.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

li.TakeOffAndLanding_Icon_Description: After takeoff, move it with the right mouse button, right-click on Non-Player faction object to forcibly attack the target, right-click on our faction object to switch to follow mode.

Cross map, no open space can be selected as the target location. To avoid situations where it is impossible to return, please ensure that there is sufficient fuel for round-trip travel

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-VultureDroidStarfighter-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: With the effectiveness of droid starfighters debated in strategic circles for generations, vulture droids were as such capable of extreme maneuvers that could crush even the sturdiest organic pilot, but lacked the resourcefulness and cunning that living pilots brought into combat. Nonetheless, a lack of life-support systems allowed more room for armaments and fuel, and the lack of an organic pilot removed, for some, any moral responsibility for its destruction.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-Scimitar-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The Scimitar, also known as the Sith Infiltrator featured folding wings around its spherical cockpit, and was secretly modified from a Star Courier manufactured by Republic Sienar Systems. The craft featured six laser cannons, a proton torpedo launcher and a minelayer. Along with its deadly armament, the Scimitar was equipped with a cloaking device, powered by rare stygium crystals from the planet Aeten II, that allowed it to disappear from view and any pursuing ship's sensors.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-SheathipedeShuttle-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: A product of Haor Chall Engineering Corporation, the Sheathipede-class was a transport shuttle with a curved hull and pincer-like landing gears, which lowered from the ship's rounded belly, and the shuttle's shape roughly resembled the Neimoidian soldier beetle.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-DroidLandingCraft-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The C-9979 landing craft, also known as the Trade Federation landing ship, was a heavy transport starship used by the Trade Federation,] and later the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-GX1ShortHauler-aero_Base
ThingDef.description: The GX1 short hauler was a shuttle model manufactured by Lantillian ShipWrights. During the Clone Wars, the Galactic Republic used several top-of-the-line GX1 short haulers, including the Phoenix and the Valorous, as diplomatic vessels. During the Age of the Empire, GX1 shuttles were used as starbuses to ferry commuters from one location to another. Although the diplomatic variant was equipped with turret-mounted double laser cannons, the civilian starbus variant had no weapons.

li.Gizmos_CarryPawn_Description: Fast loading colonizers within the surrounding 5x5 range

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-FangFighter-aero_Base
ThingDef.description:
Fang fighters were fast and highly maneuverable starship designed specifically for combat. The craft's narrow attack profile and swivel-mounted wings that provided vectored-thrust control gave the fighter unmatched agility.
Texture Donated By MyDylanScoot

ThingDef.Name: MM-SS-KomrkFighter-aero_Base
ThingDef.description:
The Kom'rk-class fighter/transport, also known as Kom'rk Class fighter transport or the Gauntlet starfighter, was a type of starfighter and troop transport used by the Mandalorian splinter faction known as Death Watch during the Clone Wars.
